label: Armor_148_Upper_Desc
text: In ancient Hyrule, only those respected by the royal family could wear this garment. A Great Fairy has increased its defense by one level.

label: Armor_076_Upper_Desc
text: Fire-resistant armor crafted by Gorons for Hylians curious enough to visit Goron City. A Great Fairy has increased its defense to its maximum level.

label: Armor_160_Upper_Desc
text: Kilton developed this jet-black armor as a result of his monster research. A spurious replica of the green outfit once worn by a legendary hero.

label: Armor_232_Upper_Desc
text: Legend has it this armor was once cherished by a hero from ancient times. Its design is simple yet traditional. A Great Fairy has increased its defense by two levels.

label: Armor_150_Upper_Desc
text: In ancient Hyrule, only those respected by the royal family could wear this garment. A Great Fairy has increased its defense by three levels.

label: Armor_072_Upper_Desc
text: Made by Rito artisans, this tunic stacks molted Rito feathers in each layer to help retain body heat. A Great Fairy has increased its defense by three levels.

label: Armor_066_Upper_Desc
text: Gerudo armor for males. Contains sapphire, which harnesses the power of ice to make the heat more bearable. A Great Fairy has increased its defense by three levels.

label: Armor_017_Upper_Name
text: Radiant Shirt

label: Armor_101_Upper_Name
text: Ancient Cuirass

label: Armor_062_Upper_Desc
text: Armor crafted by each generation's Zora princess for her future husband. Equip it to swim up waterfalls. A Great Fairy has increased its defense by two levels.

label: Armor_100_Upper_Desc
text: Armor made from ancient Sheikah technology and Guardian parts. Reduces damage from ancient weapons. A Great Fairy increased its defense by two levels.

label: Armor_006_Upper_Desc
text: Custom armor painstakingly crafted by each generation's Zora princess for her future  husband. Wearing it will give you the ability to swim up waterfalls.

label: Armor_079_Upper_Name
text: Stealth Chest Guard

label: Armor_012_Upper_Desc
text: Armor designed for stealth, passed down through the Sheikah tribe. The special fabrics suppress the rustling of clothes even when moving quickly.

label: Armor_085_Upper_Name
text: Climbing Gear

label: Armor_002_Upper_Desc
text: A common garb popular in Hyrule, especially among travelers. Its light-yet-sturdy fabric doesn't limit movement. A Great Fairy increased its defense by one level.

label: Armor_075_Upper_Name
text: Flamebreaker Armor

label: Armor_217_Upper_Desc
text: Legend has it this armor was worn by a hero who rode a mighty bird. It was apparently presented after a ceremony. A Great Fairy increased its defense by two levels.

label: Armor_207_Upper_Desc
text: Legend has it this armor was cherished by a hero who sailed the Great Sea. It was woven with love by his grandmother. A Great Fairy has increased its defense by two levels.

label: Armor_213_Upper_Desc
text: Legend has it this armor was worn by a hero who battled monsters of twilight. It looks like some wolf hair is still stuck to it... A Great Fairy increased its defense by three levels.

label: Armor_053_Upper_Desc
text: Standard Gerudo garb popular for its open, breathable design and for the traditional Gerudo markings that adorn it.

label: Armor_203_Upper_Desc
text: Legend has it this armor was once worn by a hero who traveled through time. It can be worn by a child or an adult. A Great Fairy increased its defense by three levels.

label: Armor_043_Upper_Desc
text: A thin shirt made long ago. It's coming apart at the seams, but it's better than nothing. The sleeves are a bit on the short side.

label: Armor_037_Upper_Desc
text: Fire-resistant armor crafted by Gorons for Hylians curious enough to visit Goron City. A Great Fairy has increased its defense by one level.

label: Armor_088_Upper_Desc
text: A shirt sold at the Gerudo Secret Club. It glows in the dark due to a dye made from luminous stones. A Great Fairy has increased its defense by two levels.

label: Armor_078_Upper_Desc
text: Armor designed for stealth, passed down through the Sheikah tribe. Its special fabric suppresses sound. A Great Fairy has increased its defense by three levels.

label: Armor_084_Upper_Desc
text: The ancient technology used in making this gear and its no-slip gloves will make you a better climber. A Great Fairy has increased its defense by two levels.

text: Barbarian Armor

label: Armor_090_Upper_Desc

label: Armor_106_Upper_Desc
text: This armor owes its electricity resistance to an ancient material called "rubber," which is nearly impossible to find. A Great Fairy has increased its defense to its maximum level.

label: Armor_112_Upper_Desc
text: Armor once favored by an ancient warlike tribe from the Faron region. Equipping it boosts your attack power. A Great Fairy has increased its defense by two levels.

text: Salvager Vest

text: Armor made from ancient Sheikah technology and Guardian parts. Reduces damage from ancient weapons. A Great Fairy increased its defense to its maximum level.

label: Armor_175_Upper_Name
text: Island Lobster Shirt

label: Armor_020_Upper_Desc
text: Hyrulean guards praised this armor for its superior defense. Made from sturdy plates of metal, the high level of craftsmanship that  went into it is obvious with just a glance.

label: Armor_014_Upper_Desc
text: The ancient technology in this gear will make you a better climber. The special no-slip gloves help you use your energy more efficiently to facilitate nimble climbing.

label: Armor_229_Upper_Desc
text: Armor worn by the hero from a world in which the moon threatened to fall. Wearing it provides godlike power. A Great Fairy increased its defense to its maximum level.

label: Armor_087_Upper_Name
text: Radiant Shirt

label: Armor_171_Upper_Name
text: Phantom Armor

label: Armor_225_Upper_Desc
text: Legend has it this armor once belonged to the hero of a world in which the moon threatened to fall. When you wear it, you feel a fierce, godlike power flow through you.

label: Armor_219_Upper_Desc
text: Legend has it this armor was worn by a hero who rode a mighty bird. It was apparently presented after a ceremony. A Great Fairy increased its defense to its maximum level.

label: Armor_231_Upper_Desc
text: Legend has it this armor was once cherished by a hero from ancient times. Its design is simple yet traditional. A Great Fairy has increased its defense by one level.

text: Gerudo armor for males. Contains sapphire, which harnesses the power of ice to make the heat more bearable. A Great Fairy has increased its defense by two levels.

label: Armor_215_Upper_Desc
text: Legend has it this armor was once worn by a hero who appeared from the sky riding atop a mighty bird. Apparently it was presented to celebrate the completion of a ceremony.

label: Armor_061_Upper_Desc
text: This armor was apparently crafted for a hero who travels the wilds. Strangely enough, it's just your size. A Great Fairy has increased its defense to its maximum level.

label: Armor_002_Upper_Name
text: Hylian Tunic

label: Armor_207_Upper_Name
text: Tunic of the Wind

text: Hyrulean guards praised this sturdy armor for its superior defense. The high level of craftsmanship is obvious. A Great Fairy increased its defense by two levels.

label: Armor_203_Upper_Name
text: Tunic of Time

label: Armor_174_Upper_Desc
text: There was once a man who claimed to be the very reincarnation of a fairy. He treasured this shirt, and so will you. After all, it's a rather rare find. Kooloo-Limpah!

label: Armor_180_Upper_Desc
text: Some believe this armor is inspirited by a dark entity resembling the Great King of Evil himself. It's a rather rare find.

label: Armor_037_Upper_Name
text: Flamebreaker Armor

label: Armor_086_Upper_Desc
text: The ancient technology used in making this gear and its no-slip gloves will make you a better climber. A Great Fairy has increased its defense to the maximum level.

label: Armor_170_Upper_Desc
text: Expansion Pass Bonus A shirt with the Nintendo Switch logo on it. It's a rather rare find, so wear it with pride!
